body_content.explanation: a national park (= a large area of land protected by the government because of its natural beauty or because it has a special history) in the US state of Utah:
examples: You could take time out to visit the astonishing amphitheatre of translucent stone spires at Bryce Canyon National Park, an hour away by car.
Bryce Canyon National Park installed signs at every viewpoint advising visitors to "Stay in your car during lightning storms."
